text:
Doesn't work. 
"Loading Transcript... If this doesn't load in 10 seconds or less, the video most likely does not have a transcript available.
Please be sure to have the targeted course video player open, or the transcript information cannot be transmitted properly". 
Is the only thing that will show up for any video selected. I don't recommend.
Works awesome, great for following along the video while reading the transcript. Would be nice to be able to click a line and have it go to that point in the video.
